ticket.title: Incorrect deprecation warnings for validate_on_update and validate_on_create
ticket.original-body:
The deprecation warnings for validate_on_update and validate_on_correct currently says:
*"Overwriting validate_on_create/update in your models has been deprecated, please use Base#validate_on_create/update :method instead"*
This is incorrect. The properer method to use is validate :method, :on => :create/:update.
The provided patch correts the warning messages.
